website_summaries.verdict: These Moscow Mule 16 oz. mugs come as a great starter set for someone wanting to expand their cocktail repertoire.
pros: Made from 100% food-grade copper with brass handles
Comes with 4 copper straws and a copper shot glass
cons: Hard to keep clean and shiny – even with handwashing

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Solid Copper Moscow Mule Mugs
customer_reviews.text: Real solid copper. Love the hammered look of the mugs, and the convenient stirrers and measurement cup. Excellent quality and look. I did not have to contact Customer Service for any question but the company was feeding me back with information in regard any issue I may have in regard the product. I will definitely recommend this product. Happy Customer!!
customer_reviews.author: O. Mori

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these things looks amazing! I love the addition of the matching shot glass and straws...My sister is a huge fan of Moscow Mules and she’s going to love getting these for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Christian E

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than the ones at the bar!!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very high quality and look amazing!! Wife loves the straw!! I love the drinks!! Zero issues. If you want copper mugs, buy these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I had purchased another set on line through another company and they were dull and not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The mugs were exactly what I wanted and was expecting. I had purchased another set on line through another company and they were dull and not what I expected. These on the other hand were exactly as shown and they shipped fairly quickly. No complaints here!!! Darlene C.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and scuffed up
customer_reviews.text: Just received these mugs in the mail and they are really poor quality. Some of the handles are adhered to the mugs crooked and the mugs are all beaten/scuffed up. Was really looking forward to giving them as a holiday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Vossen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price, and quality.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived a bit mauled by UPS, but in perfect shape! They look hand made, which I love. The copper straws are such a great touch. My wife and I are into zero waste and use metal straws already; but they are not the snazzy copper straws that come with these cups. And the shot glass is the final touch. They look great on the shelf!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Davis

customer_reviews.title: Such a hit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these to use at our Distillery and besides all the nice comments on how nice they are, I had a few people ask to purchase them. So I can definitely say they are a great product! Can't wait to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mugs
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set. Would have been better if it came in presentable packaging. The box looked worn out and cheap cardboard. The items were wrapped in bubble wrap. I bought it as a gift and the presentation because of the packaging did not make the items stand out as high quality which they seem to be.
customer_reviews.author: LB2309Z

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and high quality! Drink is SO cold!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak to durability, since I just got these today. However, they are beautiful and terrific quality! I washed them an made a Moscow mule that is delicious and stays SO cold! I’m happy to keep two and gift the others with some vodka!
customer_reviews.author: Dani O

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and unique set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great four-cup set with two unique surprises: copper straws and a cute copper jigger. Highly recommend this great set for personal use or a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Unbelievable

customer_reviews.title: Quality as expected. No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Typical size. Keeps those mules cold. The directions give lots of warnings about washing the mugs as soon as you’re done using them. That rarely happens in my case and that hasn’t caused me any problems as far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive set and an extremely great value. Besides including 4 hammered copper mugs, it also included copper straws, copper jigger, recipes, etc. Very, very nice. After I ordered it, I received recipes and care instructions that could be downloaded from the company. Nice touches and it showed they cared about the consumer. Very refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!!! Comes with drink recipes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mother & father-in-law. They loved it. As soon as they opened it, they loved the look of the hammered copper, and the recipe booklet that shows you how to make the Moscow Mule and variations. I would recommend this as a gift or for yourself if you're a fan of the drinks!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Was a high quality product. Got the 4 pack and gave one to each of the family. Straw is a little awkwardly tall, but it easier to make it shorter than it is to make it longer haha! The mugs are pretty big too; Enough room to make a double.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Stennett

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful copper mugs
customer_reviews.text: I loved the mugs! They were much better than I expected. However, one of the mugs has a black spot on the bottom. When I received them I inquired to the seller to see if they could replace the one mug (I ordered 8) instead of me having to return all of them. Unfortunately, I haven't received a reply so it appears i will have to return all for a replacement when in fact I only need one. I have already ordered a couple more sets as gifts . They are really nice. Just wish I could get one replacement rather than going to all the trouble of returning the all.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with extras
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set good quality and the hammered look is classy. The set also comes with four copper straws and one copper shot glass. I stick them in the freezer for about 30 minutes and they stay cold through the entire drink.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it earlier today, and within a few hours the seller emailed me. They let me know they had some issues with some deliveries recently where the end-product was damaged. They told me to let them know if anything went wrong, and they'd make it right. I really appreciated the fact they reached out before I even got the item, already willing to make it right (it was perfect!) without me having to chase them. The products were very nice. They are well made, and quite heavy! Everything is pure copper, with no nickel interior like you see on some other products.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a queen
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. I feel like a queen when I offer a cocktail in these to friends. They look so pretty. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great gift in copper
customer_reviews.text: The cups are very well made. I bought them as a gift for a friend. I only took the cups out of the box to check the quality, see if they were worth the money and if they were nice enough to give as a gift. A 10 rating across the board
customer_reviews.author: DaytonaCynthia

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute, Great Value, Copper Taste Not There
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great price and I would totally buy it again. There is a thin layer of sealant that prevents the copper taste from really affecting your drink (for me, that's kinda the point of having a Moscow Mule in a copper mug). I imagine the seal will wear off in time. I received a great little pdf on how to care for my copper, as well as a recipe book for different variations of a mule.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, however my kids put them in the dishwasher (which they don't recommend so not their fault) and they started looking dingy. My friend got some others and ran his through the dishwasher, and they still shine! So I'm not sure what causes the dingy look. But all in all, I'm happy with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Leandra Weech

customer_reviews.title: Great Mugs!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great copper mugs! Love the design of the handles. Using the copper straws makes your moscow mule even colder to drink. I liked the set so well that I bought a second set and gave for a gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: Still exploring but great copper mugs +
customer_reviews.text: I love these mugs. I really got them for the copper I get from consuming drinks in it and the booklet on how to maintain them have done justice to how I like to maintain anything I own. Will update with pictures showing the my failing (putting whiskey straight and the damage it did) to how i correct the fail.
customer_reviews.author: Rai

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well-made set
customer_reviews.text: Received right before 4th of July get-together. Everyone loved them - especially the addition of the straws! Gift-worthy packaging. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anne B. P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought it because I love making Moscow Mule and this mugs are perfect for it. Amazing quality and an outstanding customer service. Plus, the straws and measing cup are also great. I would really recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Rumiz Foodie

customer_reviews.title: These mugs are beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These copper mugs are as beautiful as the picture shown. They come with detailed instructions on use and care. We’ve already used them many times!
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who just recently discovered Moscow Mules! The mugs are of sn excellent quality and we really like the copper straws as they deliver cold sips!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ridilla

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. They feel great. They are sturdy. And of course totally make the drink. I like that they have the straw too
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kobialka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect copper mugs for home bar
customer_reviews.text: This review is long overdue. Gave these copper mugs and straws to my boyfriend as a gift and he loves them. They’re nice quality and look great. On a side note, Seller was awesome, too. They personally reached out after I got my mugs to ensure I was pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline K

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value
customer_reviews.text: I've paid up to $12 a piece for Mule mugs. Not only are these NOT that price each, but you get the shot glass and straws too! Very nicely packed so they stay shiny.
customer_reviews.author: angiemac

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Using these as a yankee swap gift for Christmas and these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Mugs arrived scratched and some had dark black marks on them. Mugs were a dull colour not shiny.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted set of four mugs, exactly the like those you would be served in a fine restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C

customer_reviews.title: Purchase these, they are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great mugs, Copper is a serious insulator for keeping adult beverages ice cold, literally frost around the mug.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Mugs
customer_reviews.text: I like that these mugs came with copper straws and a shot glass. Very attractive and kept my mules very cold.
customer_reviews.author: pflowers

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the copper mugs, straws and shot glass! My Moscow Mules are taken to a new level with this purchase! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love Mules? Then you need these mugs
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Easy to clean. Any drink connoisseur needs these in his/her collection.
customer_reviews.author: AKjos

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to someone who likes Moscow Mules and just added a wet bar to her family room. She LOVED the gift! And she was so surprised copper straws were included. Very nice gift in a nice sturdy box!
customer_reviews.author: Lanita Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great Copper Mugs for a Moscow Mule!
customer_reviews.text: Looked at several sets.....this set is very sturdy and performs well. Keeps beverages wonderfully cold to the last sip! These were much better than I could find at any local retailer. They have held up well under "multiple uses"! Great value for what you pay!
customer_reviews.author: Allen McBride

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I HAVEN'T USED THE STRAWS OR THE SHOT GLASS, BUT THE MUGS KEEP MY MULES ICE COLD!! QUICK RINSE AND DRY AND THEY STORE WELL!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Copper, giftable, fun. They’re Moscow mule cups. The extra shot glass is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: F. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny ...
customer_reviews.text: This product package is definitely worth every penny. If you are looking for a quality copper drinking talking piece...look no further. Value, Quality, and Convenience rolled up in an exquisite set for your liking ... Sometimes I find myself wanting to pour more drinks so that I can use these cool cups...
customer_reviews.author: Joel Auer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Better than anything I previously bought at high end department stores for gifts. Kept these for myself 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durability of mugs
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdiness factor of the mugs. They have a nice heft to them. The handles feel like they are welded on for good. The hammered finish is identical to the ones we used at the pubs in Las Vegas for St. Patrick's Day. We had Irish Mules instead of Moscow Mules. I ordered a set for my niece and she loves them! Will probably buy more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this set. So far I have used it multiple times and have nothing but positive things to say. The toughest judge, my wife, likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: BG Hokie

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Mule Set
customer_reviews.text: Great design with a comfortable thumb notch on the top of the handle. Excellent set with practical accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Dartri

customer_reviews.title: Great gifting item!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift. It is beautiful! The company also sent an email with recipes and instructions for care. Very nice set!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Shazam
customer_reviews.text: This set is all you would hope for in a quality entertainment item. It has the flash and awe factor, and still delivers with a sturdy set that you can sink your teeth into. If you like copper this is the set for you.
customer_reviews.author: Moxieman ME

customer_reviews.title: Excelent value for 4 mugs
customer_reviews.text: Looking in many place, this seller had the best price for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: CarJoViNat

customer_reviews.title: Way nicer than another set I bought!
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are attractive with the hammered finish, and they are well designed. A great gift for a Mule lover!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Collins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had the opportunity to use it. Hopefully next week. But by the look of the product it looks very well made.
customer_reviews.author: R Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Such a great purchase. Has to be stored out of cabinet/drawer
customer_reviews.author: Amy f

customer_reviews.title: Great Moscow Mule Mugs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these beautiful mugs to gift to a friend. Have not had a chance to give her the gift as of yet due to Covid 19. I am sure she will love them and hopefully invite me to her home to join her in a cocktail. Great that the recipe is enclosed in the box as well. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Lovely to look at and drink from!
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are so beautiful. I’m so happy to be able to have them to serve my special friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: melanie J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I like them, but they don’t arrive perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loved them, did come with very minor dents and imperfections but overall I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Mann

customer_reviews.title: If you enjoy Moscow Mule Drink then these are for you!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these because we were told that it changes the flavor or the drink. It is my opinion that it really does. It seems to keep the drink colder longer and the fizz doesn't go away from the ginger beer. We are pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Helen McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loved them
customer_reviews.text: well packaged, keeps drink cool longer than glass - we love them and my husband uses them often even for normal beverages because they help keep his drink cool longer
customer_reviews.author: Susan T

customer_reviews.title: As described - quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase. Mugs are as described. I have already washed them a couple times after use and no issues at all. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ReLoy

customer_reviews.title: Nice on hot summer evenings!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying this set but mine did not come with straws as shown. Purchased this after we had wine drinks in similar ones from a restaurant. Adds to the enjoyment of our evenings!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B

customer_reviews.title: Low Price = Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with these. While it’s nice that straws are also included, the mugs look cheap. The shot glass also looks unfinished - very dull.
customer_reviews.author: Luisana

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a fabulous item!
customer_reviews.text: This set is not only a great value, it comes with copper straws and a jigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kassira Kalea McKee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for the holidays
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for the holidays ! The design very nice , the quality it good . The size of the cups big so you can get nice amount of ice and drink! Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sounds4u

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Wonderful Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: The mugs are very high quality, and the added straws, shot glass, and e recipes are an added bonus. Also, this company exceeded my customer service expectations by personally reaching out to ensure my package was delivered safely, and in good condition. I recommend Copper Bar very highly!
customer_reviews.author: j. pap

customer_reviews.title: ... early Father’s day present and I could not be happier! A friend of mine has a set from ...
customer_reviews.text: Recieved my mule mugs yesterday as a early Father’s day present and I could not be happier! A friend of mine has a set from another place and these mugs put his to shame. I would recommend these mugs to anyone looking to buy a good quality set of copper mule mugs.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: Little tarnish present
customer_reviews.text: I like the set very much and love the recipes and history as well. Some of the cups seem to be a little tarnished or I would have given 5 stars. I realize this will happen over time although not fresh out of the box. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mug For The Perfect Beverage.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve just discovered Moscow Mules and our minds are blown 🤯🤯. We love them and these were the perfect addition for our new fav drink and for when we have friends over. Fast shipping and exactly as described. We look forward to using these mugs a lot. We’re ordering another set!! 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Big Guy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mugs Great For Personal Enjoyment Or As A Gift To Another
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great, and is a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Safety of drinking out of the cups are concerning
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered in a unkept box. Mugs itself was scuffed and poor quality. There was a strong chemical smell coming out of the cups that made us felt concern about the safety of the product. Definitely doesn't look or feel safe to drink out of.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: High quality set
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to add to our bar ware and are very happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Petty’s

customer_reviews.title: Second Drink Cold
customer_reviews.text: We have bought these three times. They are the perfect gift with some vodka, limes and ginger beer. They keep the drinks cold even when you put it down and forget you have it and find second drink later.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and they loved it. They use often would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Cute aet
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift. They seemed really pleased with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Cardwell

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely packaged and makes for a really nice gift! Have used a few times to make mules in and also drink straight ginger ale. Both are delish. Don't need to use a lot of ice to chill/keep drinks cold as the copper helps keep the drink chilled. Cups are very well build and seem very solid.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth hoover

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: All four mugs unfortunately came with scratches all over the handles and rims . I wish I could say one of the four mugs came in good condition, but they all look as if they have been used for many months already. Disappointed as for that price point you except a much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is the copper comes off. But it keeps my drinks super cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful drink ware.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. Adds character and atmosphere to any occasion. Great communication from seller with regards to any concerns I may have had. Customer satisfaction A+
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks great works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Let's start out this is perfect well made set and the look is just what I was looking for the copper straws and shot glass was a great ad on that's alot great quality perfect set
customer_reviews.author: scott mailand

customer_reviews.title: Seller made it right
customer_reviews.text: The first set came with three out of four cups dented. I will say that after contacting seller...they sent new set that was intact which I appreciated. They very pretty mugs
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery!  Lovely anniversary gift for husband
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and appreciate the email providing recipe book! Great customer service! My husband summed to like this gift for our 19th wedding anniversary! It is environmentally friendly too.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L Will

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was a perfect gift this year, gave 2, and one for me. Great for making drinks, just like out at bar. but better.
customer_reviews.author: rball

customer_reviews.title: Great gift set - Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Great set of mugs. Very sturdy. Does not look cheap. Very welL made
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Medina

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Exactly as advertised. Would not hesitate to recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pattie M.

customer_reviews.title: I would reorder
customer_reviews.text: I really like them, very pleased. just my luck one of the handles was not welded. and I totally forgot to send it back on time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mugs. For the price you can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality. Also, of the mugs was messed up and had green gunk on it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice package and came as advertised, will buy again soon
customer_reviews.author: william soto

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set, and all my friends enjoy all types of drinks
customer_reviews.author: Irena

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set and is a wonderful gift for the holidays! The cups are well made and look just like the pics. The supplier, Copper Bar, was very helpful in resolving a packaging issue. Their customer service and products are top notch!
customer_reviews.author: amber f

customer_reviews.title: Great Copper Mugs
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The love the straws that come with it. Feels nice and sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Missing and damaged straws
customer_reviews.text: There were only three straws and they were all damaged. I am unable to use them. The box was damaged as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Haydon

customer_reviews.title: You Must have Them 👏❤
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mugs 😍 Best Quality, I'm a bartender so I Know what I'm saying.
customer_reviews.author: Utab

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These mugs arrived in perfect condition. They are better than I expected for such a great price. I will order them again for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product.loved it and my guests who hang out at my home bar.really loved it
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Great gift set
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool set of cocktail glasses. We gifted them to our friends as a wedding gift.
customer_reviews.author: John king

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Beautiful Set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a Father's Day Gift, and we love them. The mugs and accessories are beautiful and the craftmanship is great. Would definitely recommend and will buy for future gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Klever

customer_reviews.title: Quality and look of item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for my Daughter's B- Day, she called me when see received them to say Thank you and to tell me they were beautiful and she really liked them very much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Love how heavy these cups are. Bought these to add to a couple other more expensive cups I already had and they did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Norma G

customer_reviews.title: So far the quality is very good !!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the mugs a lot. I also received two e-documents for the recipe and how to take care of the mugs.
customer_reviews.author: PRS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mugs
customer_reviews.text: This set is lovely! Well packaged and I look forward to using it. It would also make a beautiful gift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set. I bought it for my husband back in April and just purchased for a Christmas gift. Great quality and durability. I will recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Meilyn Ruff

product_meta.title: Moscow Mule Copper Mugs - Set of 4 - 100% HANDCRAFTED Pure Solid Copper Mugs - 16 Oz Gift Set with Highest Quality Cocktail Copper Straws, Copper Shot Glass & 2 E-Books by Copper-Bar
feature_bullets: ✔️ FOOD GRADE TARNISH RESISTANT: Pure Copper - Coated with food grade lacquer on inside and outside to retain its shine. It went through a comprehensive third-party safety and quality tests.
✔️ TOP QUALITY – Keep your drinks icy-cold, No nickel, 100% copper to give your Moscow mule the perfect taste. 16 oz. size just like the original 1941 copper Moscow mule mug.

✔️IMPRESSIVE HANDCRAFTING - HAND HAMMERED DESIGN: These are genuinely handcrafted Copper Moscow Mule Mugs. From application of the large authentic handle to the stable base and wide straws design, the attention to detail when crafting these copper mugs is unmatched. 100% Guarantee of Quality. Order Now.

🎁SPECIAL BONUSES - Your bar gift contains 4 Handcrafted Copper Mule Mugs, Copper Shot Glass, 4 Copper Straws and 2 E-books. We have a gorgeous brass handle for your thumbs comfort and we have created a fantastic stable base for your mug. Our copper mugs feature round shaped edges especially for your convenience. If that's not enough - our straws are exclusively made wider than our competitors' so they are extra easy to drink from and clean.
